about_the_game:
Master Maui’s legendary shapeshifting powers to free the island from the corrupt force of Cemyk, a nefarious creature from another world.

Features:

  • Explore a Metroidvania-style Open World: Get lost in an 2D open world set in a beautiful island that includes tropical forests, waterfalls, caves, volcanoes, and even spiritual realms.

  • Large and Detailed Map: Discover a large map full of secrets, challenges, and platforms, to unlock new areas, as well as new powers and abilities.

  • Animal Transformations: Transform into fun and exciting animals each with unique abilities, including a Green Sea Turtle, Happy Face Spider, and Kamehameha Butterfly, among others. Unlock new areas by using your new animal powers!

  • Solve Environmental Puzzles: Use Maui’s powerful fishhook to move earth and land to access new areas. Solve puzzles and new areas in creative ways.

  • Customizable Slot System: Customize your gameplay with a deep Slot System that offers a variety of abilities and performance upgrades. The slot system allows players to customize their experience to focus on abilities they enjoy the most.

  • Hand Paint Art Style: Maui the Shapeshifter continues Play on World’s commitment to 2D hand painted art. The environments, characters, animations, have been hand-drawn and hand-painted with careful attention to detail to create an immersive and beautiful world.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Amd Athlon X4 / Intel Core i3 – 4th Gen
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Vega 8 / Intel HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Amd Ryzen 3 / Intel Core i5 – 4th Gen
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RX 560 / GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: Play as Maui the demigod in an adventure to save his island home from a darkness that threatens to consume it. Transform into majestic animals, meet spirit Aumakua, explore unique biomes, face epic bosses, and defeat nefarious enemies in this epic hand-painted 2D open world Metroidvania.
